historico.texto: If you don't know where you're going, you will probably end up somewhere else.
Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
When we think about our strengths, we are strong. When we think about our weaknesses, we are weak.
It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
Life is simply what our feelings do to us.
Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
If you don't read the newspaper, you're uninformed. If you read the newspaper, you're misinformed.
There is no limitations except those we create for ourselves.
When uncomfortable, my instinct is not to avoid the discomfort but to become at peace with it.
The more you are grateful for what you have the more you will have to be grateful for.
The spirit is beyond destruction. No one can bring an end to spirit which is everlasting.
Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
Men go to far greater lengths to avoid what they fear than to obtain what they desire.
Getting lost along your path is a part of finding the path you are meant to be on.
Happiness is a gift and the trick is not to expect it, but to delight in it when it comes.
Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
A gentleman is one who puts more into the world than he takes out.
I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
Friendship takes time and energy if it's going to work.
You have a brain and mind of your own. Use it, and reach your own decisions.
